summary: VW ABS CONTROL MODULE RECALL EARLIER THIS YEAR DID NOT INCLUDE 2010 TOUAREGS.  HOWEVER, I OWN 2 OF THEM AND BOTH HAVE AN ABS MODULE ISSUE.  AS DOES MY MOTHER IN LAW'S 2010 TIGUAN.  PLEASE LOOK INTO EXTENDING THE RECALL TO THESE MODEST.  ATTACHED IS THE $2,839 ESTIMATE FROM A VW DEALER TO REPLACE THE ABS MODULE.   THAT IS AN ABSURD AMOUNT OF MONEY TO PAY FOR A GENTLY USED CAR WITH LOW MILEAGE WHICH HAS BEEN REGULARLY MAINTAINED.  THANK YOU.  [XXX]  CELL    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
